name: Cthulhu - Defender of the Realms
description:
Cthulhu - Defender of the Realms

Cthulhu - Defender of the Realms is a casual arcade game in which Cthulhu must defend against the evil hordes of men trying to destroy him. 

* Multiple levels

* Awesome soundtrack

* Great hand drawn art!

*Who can resist such a cute Cthulhu! 

Game will continue to be worked on adding more power ups and levels.

WARNING: I cannot be held responsible if you become addicted to gameplay and miss school, work, weddings, funerals, etc.
